description:
Season: 30
Original Air Date: 9/15/2017

Needing to get something off of his chest before becoming intimate with Katie, Wyatt confidentially fills her in on the current dispute between Bill and Liam.  In spite of Steffy’s attempt to appeal to his emotions, Liam is firm that he no longer wants anything to do with Bill ever again.  Bill decides to put his faith in the strength of his marriage when he tells Brooke about his quarrel with Liam and why it happened.
